TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit KeyVaultPrivateEndpointConnectionResource extends Azure.ResourceManager.ArmResource

Docs.summary: A Class representing a KeyVaultPrivateEndpointConnection along with the instance operations that can be performed on it. If you have a you can construct a from an instance of using the GetKeyVaultPrivateEndpointConnectionResource method. Otherwise you can get one from its parent resource using the GetKeyVaultPrivateEndpointConnection method.
